content: the caroline headband is a cozy and stylish knit perfect for adding a handmade touch to chilly days using soft super bulky 6 yarn and featuring beautiful braided cable stitches this pattern creates a thick textured headband that s both warm and eye-catching quick to knit and full of charm the caroline headband is a fun project for cable lovers and a great accessory for any winter wardrobe **supplies needed ** ↠ size 6 bulky yarn ↠ 9mm us size 13 knitting needles ↠ tapestry needle ↠ cable needle ↠ measuring tape
